page.description: Assign a handler script for the connection to override the default behavior of some or all of the event functions below:
page.discussion: The SetSyntaxHandlerScript() method assigns a handler script for the connection to override the default behavior of some or all of the event functions. This is an advanced topic. Note: Syntax generation functions return true if a statement has been created and false if it has not. Examples:

item.name: GenerateAddUserStatement as L (UserName as C, Statement BYREF AS C)
GenerateSelectStatement as L (TableInfo as SQL::TableInfo, Statement BYREF AS C)
